T02D2682b:211b-1: badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ra ni ma dh'a ra ni britti /
T02D2682b:211b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa /
T02D2682b:211b-4: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2682b:211b-5: de nyid rtogs pas rdo rje dang //
T02D2682b:211b-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2682b:211b-8: spyi yi rgyud la sogs pa dang //
T02D2682b:211b-9: bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten nas //
T02D2682b:211b-10: blo dman rnams la phan phyir brtsam //
T02D2682b:211b-11: gleng gzhi mtshan nyid rgyud don dang //
T02D2682b:211b-12: phan yon lhag gnas dang ni lnga //
T02D2682b:211b-13: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs lnga'i don //
T02D2682b:211b-14: bzhugs tshul zhus don rgyas pa'o /
T02D2682b:211b-15: 'di skad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyis mthus zhus /
T02D2682b:211b-16: sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'byung dka' 'byung dka' bas dus gcig thos /
T02D2682b:211b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa du ma dang bzhugs so //
T02D2682b:211b-18: de'i tshe sprul pa'i lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2682b:211b-19: rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs zhes
T02D2682b:211b-20: bya ba ni chos skur rdo rje'i rnam par ro
T02D2682b:211b-22: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D2682b:211b-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
T02D2682b:211b-24: kyis bskul cing gsol ba btab nas rdo rje la
T02D2682b:211b-26: de la sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
T02D2682b:211b-27: spobs pa bskyed nas lag na rdo rje la zhus pa'i tshe 'khor dang bcas pas thos so //
T02D2682b:211b-29: rdo rje'i don 'gag pa med pas mi chod pa dang /
T02D2682b:211b-30: yod pa dang med pas mi shig pa dang /
T02D2682b:211b-31: phyin ci ma log pas bden pa dang /
T02D2682b:211b-32: skye ba med pas sra ba dang /
T02D2682b:211b-33: mi slu bas na brtan pa dang /
T02D2682b:211b-34: dngos por 'dzin pa 'joms pas thogs pa med pa dang /
T02D2682b:211b-35: rnam rtog gi mtshan ma las ma pham pa ni /
T02D2682b:211b-36: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2682b:211b-37: rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po khro po'i don ni /
T02D2682b:211b-39: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis zhes sdang zhi bar byed
T02D2682b:212a-0: pas sems can thams cad skrag par byed @212a *
T02D2682b:212a-2: tro ta ya tro ta ya /
T02D2682b:212a-3: gshin rje gshed kyis gzung 'dzin zhi bar byed pas /
T02D2682b:212a-4: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa dang /
T02D2682b:212a-6: rta mgrin gyis rnam par rtog pa zhi bar byed
T02D2682b:212a-7: pas rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa dang
T02D2682b:212a-9: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas yang dag pa'i don 'phel bar
T02D2682b:212a-10: byed pas rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa
T02D2682b:212a-11: dang / gh'urna gh'urna h'um ka ras rang dang gzhan
T02D2682b:212a-12: rjes su 'dzin pa las thams cad 'joms par byed
T02D2682b:212a-13: dang / pa dang / gh'urna pa ya gh'urna pa ya /
T02D2682b:212a-14: stobs po ches rang don grub pas gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang /
T02D2682b:212a-15: sarba sa tva ni yid la sems pa thams cad grub par byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D2682b:212a-16: bo dha ya bo dha ya rdo rje zhe sdang
T02D2682b:212a-17: 'joms pas gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa dang
T02D2682b:212a-18: / sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
T02D2682b:212a-19: don yod zhags pas yang dag pa'i don rtogs pas gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa dang ;
T02D2682b:212a-20: bhra ma bhra ma 'dod pa'i rgyal pos phyin ci
T02D2682b:212a-21: log spong pas 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed
T02D2682b:212a-22: pa / sam bhra ma ya sam bhra ma ya /
T02D2682b:212a-23: rdo rje 'khor los byams pa la sogs pa gzhan
T02D2682b:212a-24: rjes su 'dzin pas rig sangs kyi las thams cad
T02D2682b:212a-26: sarba bh'u ta ni 'byung po la sogs pa thams
T02D2682b:212a-27: cad kyi bar chad srungs zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2682b:212a-28: // kutta kutta rdo rje rnon po 'khor 'gugs pas ma grub par byed pa dang /
T02D2682b:212a-29: sam kutta ya sam kutta ya rdo rje khros pas
T02D2682b:212a-30: yang dag par 'gugs pas grub pa rnams chud mi
T02D2682b:212a-32: sarba sha tru'm n'am dgra bgegs thams cad gnod par byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D2682b:212a-33: gha ta gha ta rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag
T02D2682b:212a-34: par 'dzud pas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin
T02D2682b:212a-35: pa dang / sam gha ta ya sam gha ta
T02D2682b:212a-36: ya rdo rje dril bu dgyes pas sems can thams
T02D2682b:212a-37: pa dang / cad srung ba / zhi ba /
T02D2682b:212a-39: rgyud don bsnyen pa sgrub ba dang //
T02D2682b:212a-40: 'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa yi//
T02D2682b:212a-41: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste //
T02D2682b:212a-42: khro bo'i don ni bco lnga'o //
T02D2682b:212a-43: de la rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor zhugs
T02D2682b:212a-44: pa'i bla ma dam pa'i man ngag can gyis byang
T02D2682b:212a-46: gnas dben par mandala dang gtor ma la sogs pa bshams te /
T02D2682b:212b-0: bum pa'i kha rgyan la sogs pa rdzogs @212b par mandala gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2682b:212b-1: de nas snying ga'i h'um las byung ba'i sgra stong par bya ste /
T02D2682b:212b-2: las kyi lha phyag mtshan med par gyur pa'i las thams cad bya'o //
T02D2682b:212b-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2682b:212b-4: na ma: rtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2682b:212b-5: zhes pas snying po gsang sngags dang /
T02D2682b:212b-7: aom tra ta zhes pas khro bo rnams dang /
T02D2682b:212b-8: sarba bidy'a badzra badzra su badzra yan chad yang snying dang bcas pas lus byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2682b:212b-10: aom ha ra ha ra badzra la sogs pa phyogs skyong bcus mtshams bcad do //
T02D2682b:212b-11: badzra aom ku sha dzv'a l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes gzhal yas khang bskyed do //
T02D2682b:212b-13: su badzra yan chad badzra gu sha dzv'a l'a ya k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:212b-15: tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:212b-16: zhes pas rdo rje gtum po bskyed /
T02D2682b:212b-17: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra ka'i li k'i
T02D2682b:212b-18: l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pas rdo rje phur bu
T02D2682b:212b-19: bskyed / ha ra ha ra badzra dh'a r'a ya
T02D2682b:212b-20: sv'a h'a zhes pas rdo rje be con bskyed do
T02D2682b:212b-21: bskyed / // pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra
T02D2682b:212b-22: pra bha nydza n'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pas rdo
T02D2682b:212b-24: gsang sngags 'di thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2682b:212b-25: rnam par 'joms pa yin pas khyad par med kyang
T02D2682b:212b-26: / bla ma dag gi zhal nas phyogs skyong ba
T02D2682b:212b-27: la sogs pa'i lha dgug pa shes pa'i bsnyen pa'i
T02D2682b:212b-29: de nas rdul tshon bzhengs so //
T02D2682b:212b-30: gtso po'i sngags gong dang mthun /
T02D2682b:212b-32: ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:212b-34: kro dha kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:212b-35: tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:212b-36: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i
T02D2682b:212b-37: l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes rdo rje gtum po dang
T02D2682b:212b-38: / rdo rje phur bu dang rdo rje be tson dang /
T02D2682b:212b-39: rdo rje tho ba rnams bskyed do //
T02D2682b:212b-41: shr'i gahram badzr'a ya sv'a zhes brgyad kyis brtan par bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2682b:212b-42: na ma:sa manta badzr'a n'am zhes pa dang /
T02D2682b:212b-43: badzra aam ku sha dzv'a l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes dbang bskur ro //
T02D2682b:212b-44: gzhan yang 'di ni las thams cad gtor ma dang ts'a ru'i ston mo dang /
T02D2682b:212b-46: ba ya rdo rje'i glu dang bcas pas bya'o //
T02D2682b:212b-47: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bla ma'i gdams ngag gis rgyas par bya ste /
T02D2682b:212b-48: bzlas pa ni snying po dang rtsa sngags yang snying dang bcas par bla ma'i ngag gis gdon no//
T02D2682b:213a-0: @213a * // de nas slob mas khrus bya ba ni he phullu ni ru phullu grihna kullu /
T02D2682b:213a-2: ku ru kullu badzra bi dza ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:213a-3: zhes pas bum pa lag pa g-yas pa'i khung du blangs la brab /
T02D2682b:213a-7: mo ta na pra mo ta n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:213a-8: zhes yungs kar gyis brab dha ra dha ra /
T02D2682b:213a-11: sarba badzra ku lam a'a brta ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:213a-12: aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat ces rma bya'i mdongs kyis byab /
T02D2682b:213a-13: de nas gsang sngags zhi ba la sogs pa dang
T02D2682b:213a-14: bcas pas slob ma'i spyi bo nas khrus byas pas
T02D2682b:213a-15: nyams grib la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dag
T02D2682b:213a-16: par 'gyur ro // nad dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2682b:213a-18: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2682b:213a-19: bi shva mu khe bahya: sarba ta tkham audga raksha ma h'a ba le /
T02D2682b:213a-20: sarba ta th'a ga ta pu rna nir dza te h'um h'um tra tha tra tha /
T02D2682b:213a-21: aa pra ti ha ta h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2682b:213a-22: zhes pas lag pa rdo rje khu tshur bcings te /
T02D2682b:213a-24: mthe bod dang gung mo gnyis rtse sprad la srin
T02D2682b:213a-25: lag gnyis rtse sprad de bsgreng pa ni dam tshig
T02D2682b:213a-26: gi phyag rgya bya ste srung ba chen mo'o //
T02D2682b:213a-27: de nas snying ga'i srung ba dang /
T02D2682b:213a-28: spyi bo'i srung ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang bya'o //
T02D2682b:213a-29: de ni khrus kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2682b:213a-30: gzhan yang zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'khor
T02D2682b:213a-31: lo la brten pa ni bla ma'i zhal las shes
T02D2682b:213a-32: par bya'o // gsang sngags kyi rgyud thams cad kyi
T02D2682b:213a-33: thog mar gsungs pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i
T02D2682b:213a-34: gzungs 'di bsod nams ye shes kyi dpal kun gyis
T02D2682b:213a-36: rgyu sdig pa thams cad byang nas 'bras bu sdug
T02D2682b:213a-37: bsngal thams cad med par byed pa ni phan yon
T02D2682b:213a-38: mdor bstan pa'o // sems can spyi de rigs bzhi gang yang rung ba'o //
T02D2682b:213a-39: dbang po nyams pa ni lus kyi'o //
T02D2682b:213a-40: tshe zad pa ni 'chi ba ste srog go //
T02D2682b:213a-41: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa med pa dang /
T02D2682b:213a-42: nor yod pa 'gribs pa gang zhig 'dod chags kyi sems la gdungs pas gnod pa dang /
T02D2682b:213a-43: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams
T02D2682b:213a-44: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni phan mi 'dogs pa ste
T02D2682b:213a-45: / de ma yin pa'i gnod pa 'byung ste de yang dz'a babs pa dang /
T02D2682b:213a-46: rgyu skar ngan pa la babs pa dang /
T02D2682b:213b-0: gzhan gyi byad du chud pa ni rig sngags @213b
T02D2682b:213b-1: ngan pas bsdams pas mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa
T02D2682b:213b-2: ste / de'i dbang gis lus dang sems kyi gdung ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T02D2682b:213b-3: rmi lam ngan pa'i sdig pa 'dra ba'i rmi ba 'dag par byed do //
T02D2682b:213b-4: rang gi nye du mdza' zhing yid dang 'thad pa'i skye bo dang bral ba dang /
T02D2682b:213b-5: dgra sdang ba'i skye bo dang phrad pa dang /
T02D2682b:213b-6: rgyal po la sogs pa'i chad pas gtses ba de
T02D2682b:213b-7: phan tshun mthun pa ma yin pa ni mi las
T02D2682b:213b-10: gnod pa 'di dag dang gzhan sel bar byed do //
T02D2682b:213b-11: gzhan yang las mi dge ba'i dbang gis dmyal ba
T02D2682b:213b-12: la sogs pa'i ngan song gsum du skyes pas lus
T02D2682b:213b-13: dang sems gdungs ba'i mya ngan dang ngal ba'i gnod
T02D2682b:213b-14: pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2682b:213b-16: de lta bu'i nyes pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni phyi ma'i phan yon no //
T02D2682b:213b-17: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho
T02D2682b:213b-18: ga des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin zhes bya
T02D2682b:213b-19: ste gang dag yid dge ba ste /
T02D2682b:213b-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2682b:213b-21: sems dang po ni dkon mchog la skyabs su song ba ni gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te /
T02D2682b:213b-22: slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2682b:213b-23: rten gyi gang zag bstan pa'o //
T02D2682b:213b-24: nor bu ni chu shel la sogs pa'o //
T02D2682b:213b-26: d'ur ba ni dag byed yin te ;
T02D2682b:213b-27: ku sha'i bye brag cig go //
T02D2682b:213b-28: rin po che rma med pa ni mu tig la sogs pa ste rgyan du rung ba'o //
T02D2682b:213b-29: tsandan ni mtshon pa ste dri'i bye brag thams cad do //
T02D2682b:213b-30: des ni snying po rdzas bstan te /
T02D2682b:213b-31: shel la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2682b:213b-32: yungs kar ni bar chod thams cad zhi bar byed ba'o //
T02D2682b:213b-33: me tog ni padma ste gsung gi rten yin /
T02D2682b:213b-34: chu yis bkang ba'i bum pa'i rgyu gser ram yang
T02D2682b:213b-35: na dngul la sogs pa gang las byas kyang rung
T02D2682b:213b-36: ste / mgrin pa phra ba kha yel ba lto
T02D2682b:213b-37: ba ldir ba rtsa ba med pa la gtsang ma'i
T02D2682b:213b-38: gos kyis brgyan pa 'bras bu can gyi shing gis
T02D2682b:213b-39: brgyan pa ni sku'i rten yin te /
T02D2682b:213b-40: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2682b:213b-41: der lha bskyed pa la sogs pa ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2682b:213b-42: de lta bur gyur pa'i rgyud zab mo'i don sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul du gyur pa /
T02D2682b:213b-43: rtog ge ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa /
T02D2682b:213b-44: rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs na mdo sde dam pa nyan pa dang /
T02D2682b:214a-1: gzhan la ston pa la sogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2682b:214a-3: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na /
T02D2682b:214a-4: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2682b:214a-5: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2682b:214a-6: mi bzad pa yi nad rnams dang //
T02D2682b:214a-7: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2682b:214a-9: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2682b:214a-10: sdug bsngal ma lus med par 'gyur //
T02D2682b:214a-12: gzhan yang rgyud 'di'i don ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2682b:214a-14: kun du snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i
T02D2682b:214a-15: bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang sgrub pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2682b:214a-16: don ci rigs par yang ngo //
T02D2682b:214a-17: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i grangs ni /
T02D2682b:214a-18: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02D2682b:214a-19: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2682b:214a-20: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i 'khor dang rtsa ba'i sngags ci rigs pa'i don to //
T02D2682b:214a-21: rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis cig //
T02D2682b:214a-23: rgyal po ni gtso bo'i don to //
T02D2682b:214a-24: yang na lus kyi rgyal po mgo yin pas so //
T02D2682b:214a-25: grong khyer ser skya chu bo gang+ga'i'i klung //
T02D2682b:214a-26: rgyud rgyal rnam 'joms bla ma'i bka' bstan sgrub //
T02D2682b:214a-27: bla med dge ba chen po bdag gis thob //
T02D2682b:214a-28: gzhan la phan phyir bdag gis de don bris //
T02D2682b:214a-29: zla 'dra'i dge ba cung zad snang ba de //
T02D2682b:214a-30: 'gro rnams rnam 'joms sku thob don phyir bsngo //
T02D2682b:214a-31: slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa
T02D2682b:214a-32: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
T02D2682b:214a-34: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra warma dang /
T02D2682b:214a-35: bod kyi lo ts'a pa sh'a kya'i dge slong rin
